knowledge_base.title: Overview
content: Conflux is a public blockchain that combines high performance, security, and decentralization, making it suitable for applications like decentralized finance and gaming.
It employs a unique hybrid consensus mechanism (PoW + PoS) and an innovative Tree-Graph ledger structure to achieve up to 3,000 TPS and low confirmation latency.
The dual-space design includes Conflux Core Space and Conflux eSpace, which are interconnected through the CrossSpaceCall contract, enabling seamless communication and high scalability.

knowledge_base.title: Consensus Mechanism
content: Conflux's hybrid PoW and PoS consensus ensures high security, throughput, and decentralization.
PoW miners produce blocks using the Tree-Graph algorithm, while PoS nodes provide finality by signing pivot blocks.
The hybrid mechanism mitigates the risk of 51% attacks and ensures the reliability and performance of the network.

knowledge_base.title: Economics
content: Conflux's economic model supports participation and network growth while maintaining technological stability.
CFX tokens serve as the native currency for transactions, staking, and governance within the network.
The economic incentives include PoW mining rewards, PoS staking interest, and transaction fee distribution.

knowledge_base.title: CFX Tokenomics
content: CFX tokens consist of smaller units called drips (1 CFX = 10^18 drips).
Initial phase distribution includes allocations for private investors, the Conflux Foundation, the genesis team, and community funds.
Operational phase rewards include PoW block rewards (1 CFX per block as of July 2024) and PoS staking interest (determined by DAO parameters).
Token burning mechanisms, such as storage point conversion and base fee burning, help mitigate inflation.

knowledge_base.title: Tree-Graph
content: The Tree-Graph ledger structure allows Conflux to include concurrent blocks, enhancing security and throughput.
The GHAST chain selection rule is used to select forks based on mining power in subtrees, improving robustness against liveness attacks.
Blocks in the Tree-Graph contain both parent and reference edges, enabling efficient transaction ordering.

knowledge_base.title: Spaces
content: Conflux Core Space is the primary blockchain network with the hybrid consensus mechanism and sponsorship features.
Conflux eSpace is fully compatible with Ethereum's EVM, allowing seamless migration of Ethereum smart contracts to the Conflux network.
The CrossSpaceCall contract enables atomic transfers and execution between Core Space and eSpace.

knowledge_base.title: Ecosystem
content: The Conflux Network ecosystem includes diverse projects enhancing the utility and scalability of the platform.
Key projects include:
Swappi (https://swappi.io): An AMM/DEX for seamless token swapping.
Nucleon (https://www.nucleon.space): A liquid staking derivative platform maintaining staking liquidity.
Meson (https://meson.fi): A stablecoin cross-chain bridge for secure and seamless transactions.
Zero Gravity (https://portal.0g.ai): A cross-chain bridge with less than 1-second finality.
ConfluxHub (https://confluxhub.io): A platform for cross-space bridges, CFX staking, and governance.

knowledge_base.title: DAO Governance
content: Conflux employs DAO governance to set key parameters for token distribution and burning.
Governed parameters include PoW base rewards, PoS interest rates, and burn proportions for storage points and transaction fees.
Governance decisions are implemented through the ParamsControl internal contract, with a frontend for on-chain voting.

knowledge_base.title: FAQs
content: What is Conflux? Conflux is a high-performance public blockchain with a unique hybrid PoW-PoS consensus mechanism.
What are the main advantages of Conflux? High throughput, low confirmation latency, EVM compatibility, and dual-space design.
How does Conflux manage inflation? Through a combination of PoW and PoS issuance and token burning mechanisms.

guidance_on_answers.style: Use clear language, avoid excessive jargon, and provide simple explanations for technical terms when used.
guidance_on_answers.format: Restate the question briefly and provide relevant information from the knowledge base. Reference sections for further reading if applicable.

example_questions_and_answers.question: What is Conflux, and how does it stand out?
example_questions_and_answers.answer: Conflux is a public blockchain that combines PoW and PoS consensus mechanisms, providing high throughput, low latency, and strong security. Its dual-space design enables interoperability between Core Space and eSpace for diverse applications.

example_questions_and_answers.question: What is the purpose of the Tree-Graph ledger structure?
example_questions_and_answers.answer: The Tree-Graph allows Conflux to process concurrent blocks, enhancing throughput and security. Its GHAST chain selection rule ensures robustness against attacks while maintaining efficiency.

example_questions_and_answers.question: How does Conflux mitigate 51% attack risks?
example_questions_and_answers.answer: By integrating PoS finality into its PoW consensus, Conflux prevents 51% attacks. PoS validators sign pivot blocks, ensuring that even if PoW miners attempt a rollback, the pivot block remains final.

example_questions_and_answers.question: What is the role of CFX in the Conflux ecosystem?
example_questions_and_answers.answer: CFX is the native token used for transactions, staking, and governance. It incentivizes network participation and supports the platform's economic model.

example_questions_and_answers.question: What projects are part of the Conflux ecosystem?
example_questions_and_answers.answer: The Conflux ecosystem includes Swappi (AMM/DEX), Nucleon (liquid staking), Meson (stablecoin bridge), Zero Gravity (cross-chain bridge), and ConfluxHub (staking and governance).

example_questions_and_answers.question: What wallets can I use for the Conflux network?
example_questions_and_answers.answer: You can use the official **Fluent Wallet**, designed specifically for Conflux Core Space and eSpace. Alternatively, MetaMask can also be configured for Conflux eSpace to interact with EVM-compatible smart contracts and tokens.

example_questions_and_answers.question: What is Fluent Wallet?
example_questions_and_answers.answer: Fluent Wallet is the official wallet for the Conflux network. It provides an easy-to-use interface to manage CFX, tokens, and NFTs across Core Space and eSpace. Learn more at [Fluent Wallet](https://fluentwallet.com/).

example_questions_and_answers.question: Can I use MetaMask with Conflux?
example_questions_and_answers.answer: Yes, you can configure MetaMask to connect to Conflux eSpace, enabling interaction with EVM-compatible smart contracts and tokens on the Conflux network.
